data.name: Night of Full Moon - Apothecary's Blessing
data.detailed_description:
A. New Character - Apothecary
“My potion, heals good, kills evil”
Little Red Riding Hood has been filled with curiosity for the natural world ever since childhood, and enjoys performing strange experiments. To care for her aging Grandma, she secretly learned how to concoct cheap potions from the crazy apothecary.

B. New Cards
We developed plenty of new cards for apothecary as well as monsters. You will experience much more strategy than before once you unlock the new DLC.

C. New Monsters
New civilizations enrolled: Beggar, Missionary, Soul Prisoner, Chameleon, Jungle Giant, Black Rose, Arsonist, Wolf King. Are the friends or enemies…?

D. New Plots
1 New Plot on new monsters
2 Each monster has its own stories
3 Easter Egg for all characters

English*, Simplified Chinese*, Traditional Chinese*

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows7,Windows10
  • Processor: 2.0 Ghz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1Gb Video Memory, capable of OpenGL 3.0+ support (2.1 with ARB extensions acceptable)
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
